template.name: Immersion Activity
template.description: Creates a new activity that shows a tuggable card as an Immersion.

parameter.name: Activity Name
parameter.help: The name of the activity class to create.

parameter.name: Activity Title
parameter.help: The human-readable name of the activity. For activities with voice triggers, this name will appear in the disambiguation menu if multiple Glassware share that trigger.

parameter.name: Launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, this Glassware will be launchable through a voice trigger
